title: Calories in 1/4 Cup Sugar
meta_description: Discover calories in 1 4 cup sugar, including carbs, sugars, and full nutrition breakdown per serving with quick tweaks and FAQs.
assumptions: Granulated white sugar, unpacked; 1/4 cup ≈ 50 g.
disclaimer: Nutrition varies by type (white, brown), brand, packing density, and measurement; check labels when available.

quick_answer.text: 1/4 cup granulated sugar provides about 194 calories, all from carbohydrates.

label_note: Totals mirror Nutrition Facts labels for easy comparison.

faqs.q: How many calories in 1/4 cup white sugar?
faqs.a: Approximately 194 calories for unpacked granulated white sugar.
Yes, 100% carbohydrates, with 50 g total sugars in 1/4 cup.
About 774 calories for 1 full cup (200 g) granulated sugar.

faqs.q: Does brown sugar have more calories than white?
faqs.a: Similar—about 197 kcal in 1/4 cup unpacked brown sugar.

faqs.q: Any protein or fat in sugar?
faqs.a: No protein or fat; it's pure carbs with 0 g fiber.
